TextLibrary.Text: Elistara, we searched all around the Bloodstone, but there was no trace of your Dragon.
Elistara, we searched all around the Bloodstone, but there was no trace of your Dragon.
Elistara, we searched all around the Bloodstone, but there was no trace of your Dragon.
Elistara, we searched all around the Bloodstone, but there was no trace of your Dragon.
Then she must still be alive! Please, I implore you, when you have a chance, could you continue the search?
Then she must still be alive! Please, I implore you, when you have a chance, could you continue the search?
